Test-1:-

Moving 4 in register 1
Moving 2 in register 2
Squaring register 2
comparing register 1 and register 2, Seeing if Flag register has 1 as value or not
HALT

0001000010000100
0001000100000010
1011100100000010
0111000000001010
1101000000000000

OUTPUT:-

0000000        0000000000000000 0000000000000100 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000001        0000000000000000 0000000000000100 0000000000000010 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000010        0000000000000000 0000000000000100 0000000000000100 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000011        0000000000000000 0000000000000100 0000000000000100 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000001
0000100        0000000000000000 0000000000000100 0000000000000100 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000001

Test-2:-

Moving 3 in register 3
Moving 7 in register 2
Muli register3 with 2
subi reg2 with 1
compare reg2 and reg3
je to 1000
muli register 3 by 0
muli register 2 by 0
HALT

0001000110000011
0001000100000111
1010100110000010
1010000100000001
0111000000010011
1111100000001000
1010100110000000
1010100100000000
1101000000000000

OUTPUT:-

0000000        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000011 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000001        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000111 0000000000000011 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000010        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000111 0000000000000110 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000011        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000110 0000000000000110 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0000100        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000110 0000000000000110 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000001
0000101        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000110 0000000000000110 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000
0001000        0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000110 0000000000000110 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000000000000


Test-3:-

Moving 8 in register 1
Divi register 1 by 0
HALT

0001000010001000
1011000010000000
1101000000000000

OUTPUT:-

raise Exception("Cannot Divide by 0")
Exception: Cannot Divide by 0
